ValidationRule.description: Force update of the Follow Up Needed field before the Follow Up Completed field can be checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( Follow_Up_Completed__c = TRUE ), ( Follow_Up_Needed__c = FALSE ), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 'Follow Up Needed' must be entered before 'Follow Up Completed' can be checked.
